author: Chris Davie
title: Antonio Conte warns his Chelsea stars over Paul Pogba’s biggest threat
text:
Antonio Conte has warned Chelsea to keep a close eye on Paul Pogba. (AMA/Getty Images) Antonio Conte has warned his Chelsea players that they must pay ‘great attention’ to Paul Pogba whenever he making runs into the penalty area.
The Premier League leaders host Manchester United on Monday evening a place in the FA Cup semi-final at Wembley on the line.
United are without Zlatan Ibrahimovic, who is serving the first match of his three-game suspension.
But Conte admits Pogba, who he signed for Juventus and won two Serie A titles with, poses a huge threat to Chelsea.
‘We are talking about a top, top player,’ said the Chelsea manager.
Pogba won two Serie A titles with Conte at Juvntus. (AFP/Getty Images) More: Football Arsene Wenger sends message to Alexis Sanchez after addressing Arsenal's senior players

‘A top player in all situations. Also in his commitment in training, trying to improve him, good technique, physically strong, great stamina.
‘We must pay great attention to him, above all when he arrives in the box.’
